sentence.Network_en: The dilemma of dandyism deeply reflects the paradox of aesthetic modernity.
sentence.Network_cn: 纨绔主义的困境,深刻反映了审美现代性中的矛盾命题.

sentence.Network_en: Beau Brummel was a noted representative of dandyism.
sentence.Network_cn: 蒲鲁马是出名的公子哥儿代表人物.
